title: Mafia: Definitive Edition – BuildID 7368608 + Chicago Outfit Pack DLC + Windows 7 Fix
body:
Mafia: Definitive Edition – BuildID 7368608 + Chicago Outfit Pack DLC + Windows 7 Fix


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Driving, Open world, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Hangar 13, 2K Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI14
Original Size: 38.6 GB
Repack Size: from 10.8 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Mafia.Definitive.Edition-CPY ISO release: cpy-mde.iso (40,035,942,400 bytes)
  • Mafia.Definitive.Edition.Update.v20210923-CODEX (1.3 GB) applied over
  • Chicago Outfit Pack DLC is included and activated; game version is BuildID 7368608 from September 23, 2021
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Useless 2K Launcher ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of voiceovers you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 38.6 to 10.8~18.7 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 6-20 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 35.6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Check the readme.txt in “Windows 7 Fix” folder if you want to run the game on Windows 7

Game Description

Part one of the Mafia crime saga – 1930s, Lost Heaven, IL

Re-made from the ground up, rise through the ranks of the Mafia during the Prohibition era of organized crime. After a run-in with the mob, cab driver Tommy Angelo is thrust into a deadly underworld. Initially uneasy about falling in with the Salieri crime family, Tommy soon finds that the rewards are too big to ignore.

Play a Mob Movie:
Live the life of a Prohibition-era gangster and rise through the ranks of the Mafia.

Lost Heaven, IL:
Recreated 1930’s cityscape, filled with interwar architecture, cars and culture to see, hear and interact with.

Re-Made Classic:
Faithfully recreated, with expanded story, gameplay and original score. This is the Mafia you remembered and much more.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is HEAVILY backwards compatible with my previous M:DE repack. The only changed files are: setup.exe, fg-02.bin, fg-04.bin & fg-07.bin. All other files can be rehashed to save you up to 14.9 GB of traffic.

CPY to CODEX Saves Conversion

Copy contents of CPY Save folder to new folder location:

CPY Save folder
Documents\my games\Mafia Definitive Edition\Data\292733975847239680
New Save folder
Documents\my games\Mafia Definitive Edition\Data\76561197960267366
